strategy_reasoning: A carousel format allows us to break down technical updates into bite-sized 'game mechanics' visual metaphors. Using the 'Retro RPG' aesthetic aligns perfectly with the brand's cozy, nostalgic vibe. We treat new models as 'New Items/Loot', bug fixes as 'Stat Buffs', and the new game as a 'Side Quest'. This makes dry technical data feel rewarding and fun.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art title screen. A wooden signpost in a lush 8-bit garden that reads 'WEEKLY QUESTS'. Tiny round pixel bees buzzing around. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient sky. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like A Short Hike. Emotionally warm and inviting.
images.description: Title card setting the cozy gaming vibe.

images.prompt: Retro RPG inventory screen in pixel art style. Two new item slots highlighted. Slot 1: A glowing blue crystal labeled 'Gemini 2.5'. Slot 2: A large golden paintbrush labeled 'Klein 9B'. Background is a soft pastel purple grid. UI elements are chunky and cute. Lime green (#ecf874) selection cursor. 8-bit aesthetic, warm vibes.
images.description: Visualizing the new models (Gemini & Klein) as collectible RPG items.

images.prompt: Pixel art status monitor screen. A retro health bar labeled 'Success Rate' filling up to green. Below it, a pixelated scroll labeled 'APPS.md' with a quill pen updating it. Soft CRT glow effect. Pastel colors, lime green (#ecf874) text. Cozy workspace vibe, like a tiny developer's desk in a game.
images.description: Visualizing the reliability fixes and issue tracking as 'stat buffs' and record keeping.

images.prompt: A magical open storybook in 8-bit pixel art style sitting on a grassy hill. A tiny pixel sword and shield pop out of the pages (representing Fable Friend). Soft sunset gradient background (peach to mint). Chunky pixels, warm nostalgia. Text floating above: 'FABLE FRIEND'. Wholesome gaming vibe.
images.description: Announcing the new 'Fable Friend' game integration.

alt_text: A carousel of 4 cozy pixel art images. 1: A garden sign saying Weekly Quests. 2: An RPG inventory screen showing Gemini and Klein crystals. 3: A retro status monitor showing success rates. 4: A magical open book on a hill for Fable Friend.
